titleStmt.title: A Combate betweene tvvo seconds. One for obeying the present government, the other, the second part of a demurrer, undeservedly called religious.
titleStmt.author: Ascham, Antony, d. 1650.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Antony Ascham.
A defense of Francis Rous's The lawfulness of obeying the present government (1649) and an attack upon A second part of the Religious demurrer, by another hand (1649).
Error in pagination: p 1 numbered p 2.
Title and imprint within single line border.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
